jobs_results.title: Mid/Senior iOS Developer (3 months)
jobs_results.description:
ABOUT THE COMPANY:

Join ADDENDUM, a global software development and IT team augmentation firm focusing on fintech, banking, and telco industries. Experience tailored benefits, diverse projects with various tech stacks, and opportunities for growth, freedom, and responsibility you desire.

ABOUT THE ROLE:

Whether you're in the heart of the Baltics or anywhere else, you'll join forces with dedicated professionals in the banking sector. Together, you'll work on exciting projects that focus on advancing and supporting the development of a mobile application. This is a contract-based role for a duration of 3 months.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:
‚Ä¢ Develop high-quality native iOS applications using Swift and/or Objective-C.
‚Ä¢ Design and implement solutions that prioritize performance, security, and outstanding user experience.
‚Ä¢ Stay updated with and apply the latest trends and best practices in user interface and user experience design.
‚Ä¢ Ensure high code quality standards while actively sharing knowledge with the team.

WHAT WE EXPECT:
‚Ä¢ Proven experience in developing native iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of iOS architecture, design patterns, and best practices for app development.
‚Ä¢ Expertise in creating secure, high-performance solutions focused on user experience (UX) and user interface (UI).
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of modern tools and workflows, including version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile methodologies.
‚Ä¢ Attention to detail in writing clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset to share knowledge and contribute to the teams success.

WHAT WE OFFER:

Salary ranges: 20 eur/hour - 40 eur/hour (the given range is flexible and depends on your experience).

At Addendum we believe in personalized benefits packages that cater to your unique passions. Tell us what drives you, and we'll craft a package accordingly. On top of that, here‚Äôs what‚Äôs in store automatically:
‚Ä¢ Flexible Hours: No more 9-to-5; work when you're at your best.
‚Ä¢ Top Talent Collaboration: Join award-winning teams from different countries.
‚Ä¢ Diverse, Challenging Projects: Break free from the ordinary with dynamic, stimulating work.
‚Ä¢ Epic Team Events: Join us for summer and winter parties and online events.
‚Ä¢ Special Celebrations: We love a good shindig for birthdays and project milestones.

And if you want to turn up the volume even more, here's what you can additionally have:
‚Ä¢ Rock star Benefits: From health and wellness to tech gadgets, we've got it covered.
‚Ä¢ Flexible Work Options: You choose your work style: from the office to a beach in Bali.
‚Ä¢ Healthy Work-Life Balance: Easy sick-leave and unlimited work-from-home options.

So, get your dancing shoes on and come join the fun!

At ADDENDUM, we wholeheartedly reject all forms of discrimination, including but not limited to age, disability, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy and maternity, race or ethnicity, religion or belief, gender identity, marriage, civil partnership, or any other protected category. We are committed to fostering a culture of equality and inclusion, where every individual has the opportunity to thrive.

jobs_results.title: Middle/Senior iOS Developer
Senior iOS Developer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
üöÄ What's the position?

This is a Full-time Senior iOS Developer position at Neybox for talented individuals who want to work on cutting-edge applications that positively impact the well-being of individuals worldwide.

üí´ What will I be working on?

You'll be working on our two apps: Pillow, a sleep-tracking app, and Today, which is a quantified-self wellness app.

Both apps have won an Editors' Choice distinction and have been featured multiple times in press and media. They have millions of users worldwide and a great roadmap ahead.

üßë‚Äçüíª What will be my role and responsibilities?

As a senior developer you will be responsible for
‚Ä¢ Building new features
‚Ä¢ Fixing bugs
‚Ä¢ Maintaining the existing codebase
‚Ä¢ Writting Unit Tests for existing and new features
‚Ä¢ Making sure the documentation of the project is accurate and helpful
‚Ä¢ Doing research on new technologies and frameworks
‚Ä¢ ‚ö†Ô∏èThis is a position that requires a commitment of 40 hours per week. This is not a part-time position.

üõ†Ô∏è What's the tech stack?

In a nutshell:

Both our apps are written in Swift (MVVM and MVC).

The UI is written in SwiftUI and UIKit.

We write Unit Tests; the code is clean and well-documented.

We make extensive use of various frameworks and machine learning.

Both apps are available for iOS only.

üåç Can I work remotely?

Of course! Our team is 100% remote. We have flexible working hours, but a good overlap between our time zones is required.

üôå What is it like working at Neybox?

Our team is small by design (6-8 people). However, we work closely together every day (Mon-Fri). For coordination, we use Slack and Jira and keep meetings at a minimum.

There's no middle management to get in the way, and we encourage new ideas and close collaboration.

üíº What are the requirements?
‚Ä¢ 4+ years of iOS development experience in Swift
‚Ä¢ Experience in HealthKit, CoreML SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, GCD, Core Data, and WatchKit.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with Git version control, Unit testing, and Continuous Integration
‚Ä¢ Experience in performance profiling with Instruments on Xcode.
‚Ä¢ Proficient use of English, both writing and speaking.
‚Ä¢ Willingness to learn and experiment with new technologies.
‚Ä¢ References from previous employers in written or spoken form may be required from previous employers.
‚Ä¢ Proficient in usage of MacOS and iOS.

üì• Great! How can I apply?

Just hit "Apply" button below!

‚ö†Ô∏è Please note that this is the only acceptable way to apply. All other ways of contacting Neybox about the position (social media, LinkedIn, email etc.), will result in immediate rejection.

jobs_results.title: Senior Ios Software Engineer (Remote)
jobs_results.description:
100% remote job

Senior Ios Software Engineer | Zenitech | Lithuania

The Role

As a Senior iOS Developer on the Design System Team, you will play a key role in the development and evolution of a unified, sophisticated design system for the client‚Äôs entire product platform. You will work with a cross-functional team to build and maintain iOS components within a sophisticated, component-based design system. This system is designed to improve the user experience across various product teams, enabling them to build modern, consistent interfaces.

What you will do
‚Ä¢ Design and develop iOS applications, focusing on iOS-specific UI components (SwiftUI, UIKit)
‚Ä¢ Work with other engineers to build out and refine the CI/CD pipelines that automate the deployment of iOS components
‚Ä¢ Maintain and enhance the front-end developer experience, collaborating closely with engineers working on the web components (React/Angular) and sharing best practices across platforms.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of professional experience in iOS development, with a strong portfolio of released iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ In-depth knowledge of Swift
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with mobile app architecture patterns (MVC, MVVM, etc.) and best practices.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with UI component libraries such as Material UI, Angular Material, Ant Design, Chakra, or proprietary solutions.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile UI/UX principles and accessibility standards.

What we offer
‚Ä¢ Hybrid / remote working model* and flexible working schedule
‚Ä¢ Private Health Insurance
‚Ä¢ People Lead system for your personal development
‚Ä¢ A culture of continuous growth, providing various training resources
‚Ä¢ Referral System
‚Ä¢ A community-first mindset, focusing on health-related initiatives, community events, team‚Äìbuildings
‚Ä¢ Technical equipment you can choose
‚Ä¢ Agile mindset, simplified processes, and a great atmosphere where commitment and autonomy are celebrated
‚Ä¢ Work with talented people across technology products and consulting
‚Ä¢ As we hire permanent employees for this role, we offer remote opportunities only in Romania, Lithuania and Hungary.

About Us

Zenitech is a leading technology solutions provider dedicated to reshaping the global digital landscape. Headquartered in the UK, Zenitech operates internationally, with offices in Lithuania, Romania, and Hungary.

We use a bespoke approach depending upon where the client is on their digital journey, comprising a combination of access to dedicated R&D labs, technology implementation advice, and specialist nearshore development talent. As an international community of individuals who are open to learn from each other, we collectively define and input into the digital future of the clients‚Äô businesses.

Why Zenitech?
‚Ä¢ Impactful Projects: Drive meaningful change through digital transformation projects and have an opportunity to make an impact on many different industries.
‚Ä¢ Collaborative Culture: Be part of a diverse, inclusive team committed to growth, innovation, and continuous learning.
‚Ä¢ Professional Growth: Zenitech supports continuous learning and development through the People Lead system, helping you advance your skills and career.

Diversity and Inclusion

Zenitech celebrates diversity in all its forms. We aim to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued for their unique contributions and perspectives. If you require any adjustments during the application process, please let us know‚Äîwe‚Äôre here to help. Our commitment to diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging can be found here.

Show more

Show less

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer
jobs_results.description:
TransferGo is a FinTech company that offers the most convenient and fast way to send money abroad. We‚Äôre growing rapidly and looking for an ambitious and bright individual to join our tech team and lead the iOS app development process.

Based in London and Vilnius, TransferGo is currently more than 60 in size and moving millions of euros every month. If you're looking for a company where you can grow fast both professionally and personally, you might have just found it!

The role

You will be working within our tech department to lead the iOS application development and make our product accessible to iOS users all around the world. Main responsibilities will be:
‚Ä¢ Lead iOS native application development process
‚Ä¢ Work together with developers and other stakeholders to build smooth & scalable app
‚Ä¢ Educate and share knowledge of the best software development practises
‚Ä¢ Contribute to quality by identifying spots of improvements

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English
‚Ä¢ Experience in creating and building new iOS applications
‚Ä¢ 2+ years experience in object oriented development ‚Äî protocol oriented development and functional programming experience would be a plus
‚Ä¢ Experience with REST APIs
‚Ä¢ Unit Testing, Git and knowledge of continuous delivery would be beneficial
‚Ä¢ A good sense of what creates engaging, trendy and innovative user experiences

Benefits
‚Ä¢ Highly skilled team members
‚Ä¢ Access and licenses to latest tools and technologies
‚Ä¢ Guaranteed yearly training budget
‚Ä¢ Fun working environment

Sounds like it‚Äôs you we‚Äôre looking for? We can't wait to meet you! Please contact our team directly by applying via the "apply for this job" button.

Check out more about us on https://www.transfergo.com/en and https://www.transfergo.com/en/career/

jobs_results.title: iOS Engineer (NordVPN)
jobs_results.description:
The Mobile department believes in constant improvement and innovation, so it takes the initiative to refine all products at every stage. We‚Äôre actively involved in all phases of development with other teams to obtain the best outcomes ‚Äì from the simplest UI elements to innovative features.

Main Responsibilities
‚Ä¢ Together with the team of developers, QA Lead, Engineering Team Lead, Engineering Manager, and a Product Owner, work on building an iOS app for a global leading product
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain NordVPN application for iOS platform in Agile development cycle.
‚Ä¢ Manage cross-team dependencies while working on technical solutions together.
‚Ä¢ Mentor or share your expertise with other team members.
‚Ä¢ Follow the team and common agreements.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to improvements in team processes, development conventions, and architectural solutions.
‚Ä¢ Write documentation for developed features and improvements.
‚Ä¢ Keep App quality by writing UNIT/Integration tests

Core Requirements
‚Ä¢ 3+ years of macOS/iOS development.
‚Ä¢ SWIFT programming experience
‚Ä¢ GIT proficiency.
‚Ä¢ Understanding of CI/CD.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of best practices for writing quality code and testing.
‚Ä¢ Experience with writing UNIT/Integration tests

Bonus Points For
‚Ä¢ Experience with Network Extension.

Tools You Will Use
‚Ä¢ 100% Swift codebase
‚Ä¢ UIKit
‚Ä¢ Xcode
‚Ä¢ Combine
‚Ä¢ Realm
‚Ä¢ Swift Package Manager
‚Ä¢ MVVM+C Architecture

Salary Range
‚Ä¢ Gross Salary 3150 - 5460 EUR/month

About Us
Nord Security is a global leader in internet privacy and security solutions and Lithuania‚Äôs second tech unicorn. Established in 2012, Nord Security now has more than 1400 employees and serves millions of users worldwide. Our team has a global mission to shape a more secure and peaceful online future for people everywhere. With that in mind, we built several advanced cybersecurity solutions: NordVPN, NordLayer, NordLocker, NordPass, NordProtect, NordStellar, and Saily.
NordVPN is the world‚Äôs most advanced VPN service provider, used by millions of internet users worldwide. NordVPN provides double VPN encryption and Onion Over VPN and guarantees privacy with zero tracking. One of the key features of the product is Threat Protection, which blocks malicious websites, malware, trackers, and ads. NordVPN is very user friendly, offers one of the best prices on the market, and has over 5,000 servers in 59 countries worldwide.

And we‚Äôre always looking to expand our team of:
‚Ä¢ Future shapers
‚Ä¢ Restless achievers
‚Ä¢ Self-movers
‚Ä¢ Honest communicators
‚Ä¢ Team players

What We Offer
‚Ä¢ Access to Nord Security products. We build solutions used by millions of users worldwide, and you‚Äôll get to experience our products firsthand;
‚Ä¢ Professional growth. Internal and external events, online training, conferences, books - everything you need to reach full potential;
‚Ä¢ Health benefits. Private health insurance, online and on-site workouts, consultations to feel and be your best;
‚Ä¢ Mental wellbeing. Access to mental health tools like Calm, Headspace, and Mindletic. Options for therapy to keep your emotional wellbeing in check;
‚Ä¢ Team spirit. Team buildings and parties with games, shows, tastings, food coupons, gifts, and it‚Äôs on us;
‚Ä¢ More free time. Stay with us and additional vacation days will be added to your calendar;
‚Ä¢ Additional paid leave. Additional days are covered by us in cases of illness or special occasions;
‚Ä¢ Flexibility. Flexible working time arrangement

Kindly refer to our Privacy Notice for Recruitment Candidates for comprehensive information regarding our data handling procedures throughout recruitment processes: https://bit.ly/3urJdOL

jobs_results.title: Senior iOS Engineer - Global Bank
jobs_results.description:
About The Team

At SumUp, we‚Äôre on a mission to empower small businesses around the world by giving them the tools they need to thrive. Over 4 million merchants in 36 countries trust us as their financial partner, and we‚Äôre proud to help them manage payments, finances, and customer relationships with ease.

Our Global Bank Tribe is at the heart of this mission, building a cutting-edge digital banking experience tailored to the unique needs of small businesses. Whether simplifying mobile banking or enabling seamless financial transactions, our SuperApp is transforming how merchants manage their finances ‚Äì quickly, intuitively, and effectively.

About The Role

As a Senior iOS Engineer in the Global Bank tribe, you‚Äôll play a key role in shaping the future of mobile banking for millions of merchants worldwide. You‚Äôll tackle complex technical challenges, refine our modular architecture, and build elegant, server-driven UI solutions for diverse markets.

This isn‚Äôt just about writing code ‚Äì it‚Äôs about crafting a product with purpose. You‚Äôll have the chance to see your impact at scale, collaborate globally, and deepen your skills in a supportive and innovative environment. Together, let‚Äôs redefine what banking can do for small businesses.

What You‚Äôll Do
‚Ä¢ Design, build, and maintain the mobile banking features to empower our global merchant userbase with smooth and engaging banking operations.
‚Ä¢ Write high-quality, clean, and scalable code that meets the highest standards of performance and reliability.
‚Ä¢ Contribute to architectural discussions, propose innovative solutions, and help shape the technical roadmap of our iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ Work closely with product and design teams to deliver features that are maintainable, user-friendly, and visually beautiful.
‚Ä¢ Mentor junior engineers and share knowledge across the Mobile Chapter and the broader organization.
‚Ä¢ Debug and test code rigorously to ensure reliability and quality for a global user base.
‚Ä¢ Develop a wealth of knowledge about our complex problem domain as well as its implications in the interface and the backend ‚Äì and how to manage it in a clean way.

You‚Äôll Be Great for This Role If
‚Ä¢ You have experience building and shipping scalable complex iOS applications.
‚Ä¢ Are skilled in Swift, Combine, and SwiftUI, with a passion for clean, maintainable code.
‚Ä¢ You have a solid understanding of software design patterns (e.g., MVVM, MVP) and expertise in building modular, scalable app architectures.
‚Ä¢ You strive for clean code and know how to write flexible tests that won't break.
‚Ä¢ You have expertise with testing frameworks and know how to implement robust test strategies (unit, snapshot, XCUITest, etc.).
‚Ä¢ Care deeply about usability, quality, and building seamless user experiences.
‚Ä¢ You have a product-focused mindset, enjoy collaborating with cross-functional teams, and take ownership of your work.

Why you‚Äôll enjoy working at SumUp:
‚Ä¢ Be part of a company that values diversity and celebrates unique perspectives.
‚Ä¢ Work with a global team of skilled professionals in an environment that fosters collaboration, learning, and growth.
‚Ä¢ Be part of a global tribe building a banking solution from the ground up and delivering impactful solutions to the real-life problems of millions of SumUp merchants all over the world
‚Ä¢ Career growth and learning opportunities: We invest in your development through regular training, mentorship programs, SumUp University leadership cohort and a yearly learning budget (2,000 EUR)
‚Ä¢ You‚Äôll receive 25 days‚Äô paid leave and 1 day additionally for your Birthday
‚Ä¢ Join a global team where you belong: Check out our D&I Initiatives and Employee Resource Groups such as Pride Club, SumAfro, Neurodiversity, Grupos Mais, Women in Tech, and more
‚Ä¢ A lot of other benefits such as Health Insurance, Sabbatical program for tenured SumUppers, Language Learning platform/courses etc.
‚Ä¢ Enrollment onto our virtual stock ownership program - you will own a stake in SumUp‚Äôs future success.

Salary range: 5250 - 7500 Euro GROSS / month + VSOP

About SumUp

Be empowered to do more that matters.

At SumUp, we're on a mission to empower small businesses across the globe by providing simple and affordable tools that allow them to thrive. Today, over 4 million businesses in 36 markets rely on SumUp as their financial partner to manage payments, finance and customer relationships.

Our commitment to small businesses is reflected in our diverse team of over 3,000 SumUppers from over 90 nationalities, united by global collaboration and an innovative mindset. Our core values lay the foundation for who we are and what we stand for, shaping our work culture and driving our success. We foster inclusivity and a continuous learning culture, providing a safe space for personal and professional growth. Our differences make us unique and strong as we strive to create an environment where everyone belongs and feels supported, no matter how they identify.

SumUp is proud to be an Equal Employment Opportunity employer, actively seeking and embracing diversity in our workforce. We don't make hiring or employment decisions based on race, colour, religion or religious belief, ethnic or national origin, nationality, sex, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability, age or any other basis protected by applicable laws or prohibited by company policy. Our commitment extends beyond recruitment to creating a safe and respectful workplace where harassment of any form is strictly prohibited.

Explore career opportunities with us and join a team driven by collaboration, innovation, and a shared vision of creating a world where everyone can build a thriving business. Discover more about our vibrant and inclusive work culture and how we work on our careers website, and follow our journey on LinkedIn and Instagram.

Job Application Tip

We recognise that candidates feel they need to meet 100% of the job criteria in order to apply for a job. Please note that this is only a guide. If you don‚Äôt tick every box, it‚Äôs ok too because it means you have room to learn and develop your career at SumUp.

jobs_results.title: Mobile Engineer (iOS)
jobs_results.description:
At Trafi we build connected mobility solutions that help people, cities and companies move towards a more balanced and sustainable future. We work with cities to connect and automate all their mobility options ‚Äì from public transport to micromobility and every service in between ‚Äì into a single platform.

We aims to help people navigate their city smoother. By providing reality reflecting, accurate and timely information, narrowing down traveling options to suit any circumstances and personal preferences, we eliminate time wasted waiting for the vehicle or apologizing for being late.

We are searching for a Mobile Engineer (iOS) to join our multi-disciplinary team working across design, user research, and development to discover and create a seamless mobility experience. Together we define what the UX and UI of a future mobility service app look like and develop Trafi's flagship service.

At Trafi you will work in a fast-paced agile environment, so you should be the type of person who enjoys that. We think fast, learn fast and deliver fast, we get our hands dirty and enjoy solving new technical challenges that we face. You will have a high degree of autonomy and responsibility, so you can contribute with your own ideas, try out new technologies, and create real impact. At the same time, you will be surrounded by a team of some of the most brilliant engineers, who can provide stimulating feedback and help you learn and grow.

Some of the things our iOS developers do:

‚Ä¢ Write Swift code in a 100% native codebase that supports two latest iOS versions
‚Ä¢ Write code that writes code
‚Ä¢ Use SwiftUI and TCA for new features
‚Ä¢ Maintain UI with a clear boundary between logic and presentation (https://github.com/trafi/states)
‚Ä¢ Use and maintain components from an in-house UI component library
‚Ä¢ Enjoy Swift package manager for a modular architecture ‚Äî each city‚Äôs app is a unique combination of feature modules
‚Ä¢ Instrument and monitor their code
‚Ä¢ Maintain our apps‚Äô backend Swagger schema
‚Ä¢ Manage our mobile CI & CD pipeline on TeamCity

Check-out our tech stack here: https://stackshare.io/trafi/trafi

Requirements

‚Ä¢ 3+ years of experience in native mobile application development (iOS)
‚Ä¢ Working knowledge of FRP, RxSwift and Combine
‚Ä¢ One or more published mobile applications under your belt

Advantages you may have:

‚Ä¢ Familiarity with backend programming (C#)
‚Ä¢ Experience contributing to and/or maintaining open-source projects
‚Ä¢ Experience in maintaining and developing white-label code bases

SalaryThe salary range for this position is 3800 - 5900 Eur gross per month

Benefits

‚Ä¢ Work Your Way. Enjoy the flexibility to work remotely from anywhere (compliant with EU laws). Our office is located in Vilnius when you want to drop by and say hi!
‚Ä¢ Talented colleagues. Collaborate with colleagues who are experts in their fields, fostering an environment of learning and growth.
‚Ä¢ Health Benefits. We've got your well-being covered with medical insurance, ensuring you're in great shape. Additionally, you can personalize your wellness options using Stebby.
‚Ä¢ Learning Budget. Your growth matters to us. We've set aside a budget for your personal and professional development, so you can continue to grow.
‚Ä¢ Convenient Commuting. Take your pick between parking options or a monthly allowance for the Trafi app, so you can get to work without stress.
‚Ä¢ Team Time. Enjoy team-building activities with a dedicated budget and time off to strengthen connections.
‚Ä¢ Christmas Break. Enjoy an extended holiday season with extra days between Christmas and New Year to unwind, recharge, and spend quality time with loved ones.
‚Ä¢ Bonus Vacation. Get an additional three bonus days. Take some time off to relax, and do what you love during your extended break
‚Ä¢ Secure Your Future. Thinking ahead? We offer the option to allocate a part of your salary to a pension fund for your stable future.
‚Ä¢ Share Options. Invest in your future alongside us! Our Share Options program invites you to become a part-owner in our journey to success.

jobs_results.title: iOS Developer (Food Delivery sphere)
Mobile Application Developer
jobs_results.description:
MBito is an innovative company dedicated to making Mercedes vehicle diagnostics accessible and user-friendly for Mercedes owners worldwide. With over 10 years of experience in remote and local diagnostics, we empower thousands of customers to understand and control their car's health. Our MBito OBD2 Bluetooth Scanner and mobile app allow users to unlock, customize, and maintain their vehicles with ease.

We guarantee a start-up environment where you‚Äôll have the full power to suggest and implement new features. You‚Äôll work closely with engineers to integrate software with hardware, and you‚Äôll be involved in tuning luxury cars to make them more premium. While we prefer working from our Kaunas office for better cooperation and hands-on hardware testing, hybrid remote work is also possible. The office provides snacks, a great vibe, and an environment where things get done.

Tasks
‚Ä¢ Develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications Android and iOS using React Native framework.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with cross-functional engineering teams to define, design, and ship new features.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of mobile applications.
‚Ä¢ Identify and correct bottlenecks, and fix bugs.
‚Ä¢ Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.

Requirements
‚Ä¢ Have experience working as a React Native Engineer.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of SQL and experience with database management (Hasura).
‚Ä¢ Hands-on experience with GraphQL.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with virtualization technologies like Docker.
‚Ä¢ Basic knowledge of Linux for system management and deployment.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automated deployment strategies.
‚Ä¢ Solid problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Benefits
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to work with cutting-edge automotive technology and luxury cars, making them even better.
‚Ä¢ A start-up atmosphere with full autonomy to implement your ideas.
‚Ä¢ Flexible working hours and hybrid work options.
‚Ä¢ Snacks, good vibes, and an environment where you can truly make things happen.
‚Ä¢ Competitive salary and benefits.

We can‚Äôt wait to see how you‚Äôll help us innovate!
